title: A Time out of war
creator_credit: University of California, Los Angeles, Film Associates and Denis Sanders
brief_description: A dramatic episode from the American Civil War when two Union soldiers and one Confederate soldier, facing each other at a battle front, agree on an hour’s truce. Based on “Picketts” by Robert W. Chambers.
